text: was a Japanese movie director. He was known for his stylish and popular Pink movie Angel Guts movie series. Sone died on August 26, 2014 in Usuki, Ōita from pneumonia, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Japan Category:Japanese movie directors Category:Japanese movie producers Category:Japanese screenwriters Category:People from Gunma Prefecture
title: Chūsei Sone
